entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
